features
Class TestSetFeatureLoader

java.lang.Object
  features.TestSetFeatureLoader

public class TestSetFeatureLoader
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to build a "features table" for each Review instance in the Yelp test set.

Field Summary
static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,features.Features> reviewFeatures
          Stores the Review's review id as the key and the Features object as the value.
static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> stopWords
          ArrayList of stopwords to be removed from a Review instance's text.
static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> topNP
          ArrayList containing the top noun phrases that a useful review has.
 
Constructor Summary
TestSetFeatureLoader()
           
 
Method Summary
static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getNPList(java.lang.String text)
          Loops through the list of top noun phrases and checks to see if the Review text contains that noun phrase, if so it will set the bit representing that noun phrase.
static int getReviewLen(java.lang.String text)
          Removes all stopwords from the review content, than gets the remaining length.
static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
           
static void printReviewFeatures()
          Outputs the Features Table for the test set of the Yelp data.
static void readReviewFeatures()
          Reads in the Review objects previously generated by the Review Processor, application and tagged by the StanfordCore NLP POS tagger, and parsed by XMLParser.
static void readUtilFiles()
          Reads in the top noun phrases and list of stopwords.

public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,features.Features> reviewFeatures
Stores the Review's review id as the key and the Features object as the value.

topNP

public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> topNP
ArrayList containing the top noun phrases that a useful review has.

Constructor Detail

TestSetFeatureLoader

public TestSetFeatureLoader()
Method Detail

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

printReviewFeatures

public static void printReviewFeatures()
Outputs the Features Table for the test set of the Yelp data. Each Review instance is a row(a Feature object), and every column is field in the Feature object. This file will be used as input to generate predictions in RapidMiner.

readUtilFiles

public static void readUtilFiles()
Reads in the top noun phrases and list of stopwords. It stores the values in class level structures, topNP and stopWords.

readReviewFeatures

public static void readReviewFeatures()
Reads in the Review objects previously generated by the Review Processor, application and tagged by the StanfordCore NLP POS tagger, and parsed by XMLParser.

getNPList

public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getNPList(java.lang.String text)
Loops through the list of top noun phrases and checks to see if the Review text contains that noun phrase, if so it will set the bit representing that noun phrase.

Parameters:
text - is the Review instance's text
Returns:
the bit vector representing the presence of top noun phrases in the Review text.

getReviewLen

public static int getReviewLen(java.lang.String text)
Removes all stopwords from the review content, than gets the remaining length.

Parameters:
text - the Review text
Returns:
length of non-stopword tokens in a Review
